show_name: ESPer Mami: Hoshizora no Dancing Doll (movie)
other_title: Mami the ESPer: Dancing Dolls in a Starry Sky
エスパー魔美 星空のダンシングドール (Japanese)
plot: Mami and a puppeteer troupe help each other out as they try to comfort a little girl name Tomoko and deal with a group of thugs who don't want the land being used by the entertainers.
